content:
IValueProviderSource Interface

Definition

Defines the method that is required for a value provider source.

In this Article

public interface IValueProviderSource

Methods

GetValueProvider(ModelBindingExecutionContext)

Returns a value provider.

public System.Web.ModelBinding.IValueProvider GetValueProvider (System.Web.ModelBinding.ModelBindingExecutionContext modelBindingExecutionContext);
Parameters
modelBindingExecutionContext
ModelBindingExecutionContext

The execution context.

Returns
IValueProvider

The value provider.
